title: Screen gliches with the clock appi
content: Hi people after updating to Android 11 the Google clock app seems to have been effected in some weird way when I turn on my phone or just want to access it my home screen in particular the clock app because of its size in terms of I have it sized large so it is easily read I noticed it twitching and flickering I screen recorded this and took some screenshots when looked over the recording I could see that this flickering and twitching effects everything but not the app icons see the attached screenshots does anyone have any idea or is this more android 11 bugs
